text: The cDNAs encoding <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein or the truncated <extra_id_0> GATA3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( lacking the two zinc fingers ) were cloned in frame into an expression vector along with the <extra_id_0> TAT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> sequence as previously described [ 63 ] .
Proteins were expressed in BL21 Star ( DE3 ) pLysS ( Invitrogen ) and lysates were purified by Ni2+-chelate column chromatography .
Both <extra_id_0> TAT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - linked proteins were more than 95 % pure , based on Coomassie blue staining of sodium disulfate acrylamide gels .
